author: stefan2
msg: Working our way up the API stack: bump svn_repos_get_logs to support
the move_behavior option.  This also implies that we need to assign
1-letter actions to the new change types:
- "E" for move-replaced (i.e. move to a previously deleted path)
fs_mergeinfo_changed): call new FS API; handle new change types
do_logs): pass-through of new move_behavior parameter

author: bobharner
msg: Replaced our copy of the SiteExporter Java source with Dan Kulp's latest (http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/cxf/web/src, which has lots of bug fixes), and updated the template file to match. Alternatively we could have done an svn:external, and maybe that'd be best for the future.

author: stefan2
msg: Follow-up to r1525429: Fix a copy-n-pasto.
(verify_moves): call the FSX-private API instead of FSFS
